911e484b-c10c-46a8-bc94-885ca6d020d0.description: This badge demonstrates general knowledge of Teradata Vantage. Earners of this badge can describe Teradata Vantage, the analytic challenges it addresses, its business value, and its vision for the future. They can also share a Teradata analytics success story and, at a high level, describe the Teradata Vantage architecture and query execution flow.
911e484b-c10c-46a8-bc94-885ca6d020d0.name: Teradata - Intro to Vantage

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Introduction to Teradata Vantage web-based course 58209 with a passing score of at least 75%.

961d51d4-e85f-472e-851a-7a9e78a86433.description: A Vantage Certified Associate has knowledge of the core concepts of the Teradata Database at release 16.00. The Associate understands relational database concepts, the major components, core features and functionality, security and privacy, and Teradata’s data distribution and data access methods including a basic understanding of Teradata Tools and Utilities. The Associate understands at a conceptual level how Teradata provides value (use cases).
961d51d4-e85f-472e-851a-7a9e78a86433.name: Vantage Certified Associate

badge_template_activities.title: Acquire skills from industry experience and training courses
Pass a proctored exam, Associate Exam, with identity verification at a Pearson VUE Authorized Testing Center

3a87c029-7f50-4a91-82c1-54f0afe66c8c.description: Successful completion of this introductory curriculum familiarises Teradata consultants with best-practice consulting skills and an Essential Level of competency training.
3a87c029-7f50-4a91-82c1-54f0afe66c8c.name: Consulting Skills - Essentials Level

badge_template_activities.title: For Teradata consulting employees, badge issuance is dependent on the completion of a percentage of pre-selected courses in Linked-In Learning and hosted through the Teradata University learning portal.

65375eb2-1001-403a-973f-65320611aac4.description: Successful completion of this introductory curriculum familiarises Teradata employees and external Partners alike with both the company's flagship Vantage software and essential differentiators in the on-premesis, cloud, and hybrid analytic platform markets.
65375eb2-1001-403a-973f-65320611aac4.name: Vantage Training - Essentials Level 2021

badge_template_activities.title: For Teradata employees and external Partners, badge issuance is dependent on completion of select Vantage courses in Teradata University.

0486f356-a515-451e-bee5-50c349934c39.description: This badge demonstrates general knowledge of Teradata Vantage. Earners of this badge can describe Teradata Vantage and its key components, differentiate between the components that are available with the initial release versus those that are part of the future vision, articulate the business challenges it addresses and the business value it providesand find additional resources
0486f356-a515-451e-bee5-50c349934c39.name: Teradata - Intro to Vantage 2.3

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Introduction to Teradata Vantage web-based course 86079 with a passing score of at least 75%.

6232e4a7-b1e6-4916-8321-7372aa9b0498.description: A Vantage Certified Associate 2.3 has knowledge of the core concepts of the Vantage 2.3 including Advanced SQL Engine release 17.10. The Associate understands general concepts, data warehouse architectures, Teradata advanced SQL engine architecture and components, data distribution and access, security and privacy as well as a basic understanding of Teradata Tools and Utilities and related cloud concepts. The Associate understands at a conceptual level how Teradata provides value (use cases).
6232e4a7-b1e6-4916-8321-7372aa9b0498.name: Vantage Associate 2.3 Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Acquire knowledge from training courses
Pass a proctored exam, Associate 2.3 Exam, with identity verification at a Pearson VUE Authorized Testing Center or via online proctoring

931a6ec1-6afc-4acb-9fd5-5a12bf4fb43c.description: This badge demonstrates skills and knowledge of Teradata SQL. Earners of this badge understand relational database concepts, basic Teradata SQL, BTEQ, and data types. They know how to create, drop and alter tables. They also understand simple and parameterized macros. Learners who complete this course understand logical and conditional expressions, subqueries, output attributes, inner and outer joins, and set operations.
931a6ec1-6afc-4acb-9fd5-5a12bf4fb43c.name: Teradata - SQL

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Teradata SQL on-demand course with a passing score of at least 75%.

05f23376-7682-40e9-ae03-5f878c425fe4.description: Teradata is an Anti-Racist Company and is committed to identifying & extinguishing any system, value, behavior or organizational process that perpetuates systemic racism. I contribute to this effort by making a pledge to diversity, equity and inclusion. By committing to these behaviors and actions with my colleagues, together, we will create an environment where employees feel safe and free from discrimination and racism. I invite you to join me in taking this pledge at https://bit.ly/2Xd9C21
05f23376-7682-40e9-ae03-5f878c425fe4.name: Diversity, Equity and Inclusion Pledge

badge_template_activities.title: Badge earners commit to the Diversity, Equity and Inclusion pledge.

4599fabc-8b3b-4079-86f2-6d6be085e00c.description: This course is specifically designed for those who are new to the Teradata Advanced SQL Engine 17.10. This course describes the following basic concepts of a database: • Organizing and managing databases • Building relationship within databases • Relational database and functions • Architecture and components • Data flow and deployments
4599fabc-8b3b-4079-86f2-6d6be085e00c.name: Teradata - Intro to Advanced SQL Engine 17.10

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Introduction to Teradata Vantage web-based course 86197 with a passing score of at least 80%.

d23e381c-1f48-41bb-8643-d216783374da.description: Successful completion of this introductory curriculum familiarizes Teradata Sales associates with foundational cloud knowledge and competencies.
d23e381c-1f48-41bb-8643-d216783374da.name: Sales Cloud Basics

badge_template_activities.title: For Teradata employees, badge issuance is dependent on the completion of the Sales Cloud Basics curriculum.  The curriculum includes an assessment which has an 80% pass rate requirement.

5563929a-8328-415b-a529-95ffc3276333.description: A Vantage Certified Administrator has core knowledge and skills necessary to manage archives, plan capacity requirements, and identify optimal database and table design including indexing options. They are able to use database tools and utilities, manage performance and usage data, produce security auditing reports, and monitor/manage database space. Admins are also able to administer users, manage system logging options, database privileges, and identify relevant workload management components.
5563929a-8328-415b-a529-95ffc3276333.name: Vantage Certified Administrator

badge_template_activities.title: Acquire skills from industry experience and training courses
Earn the Vantage Certified Associate Certification
Pass a proctored exam, Administrator Exam, with identity verification at a Pearson VUE Authorized Testing Center

Bypass Option:  Eligible Teradata 14 Certified Individuals may bypass earning the Vantage Certified Associate credential and pass one proctored exam, Administrator Exam, with identity verification at a Pearson VUE Authorized Testing Center

3b6bb22a-7b0d-448e-b300-e5f91eb0e5dd.description: A Vantage Certified Associate has knowledge of the core concepts of the Advanced SQL Engine at release 16.20 and Vantage 1.1. The Associate understands general concepts, data warehouse architectures, Teradata advanced SQL engine architecture and components, data distribution and access, security and privacy as well as a basic understanding of Teradata Tools and Utilities. The Associate understands at a conceptual level how Teradata provides value (use cases).
3b6bb22a-7b0d-448e-b300-e5f91eb0e5dd.name: Vantage Associate Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Acquire knowledge from training courses
Pass a proctored exam, Associate Exam, with identity verification at a Pearson VUE Authorized Testing Center or via online proctoring

78267b21-827a-44dd-861c-f1cbfe68b6a4.description: A Vantage Certified Developer has the knowledge and skills necessary to design and write optimized SQL that acquires, integrates and accesses data in Teradata environments. They have knowledge of database design concepts and indexing strategies for query and ETL development. Successful candidates can effectively use the Teradata database features, tools and utilities.
78267b21-827a-44dd-861c-f1cbfe68b6a4.name: Vantage Certified Developer

badge_template_activities.title: Acquire skills from industry experience and training courses
Earn the Vantage Certified Associate Certification
Pass a proctored exam, Developer Exam, with identity verification at a Pearson VUE Authorized Testing Center

Bypass Option:  Eligible Teradata 14 Certified Individuals may bypass earning the Vantage Certified Associate credential and pass one proctored exam, Developer Exam, with identity verification at a Pearson VUE Authorized Testing Center

69c87b01-beda-4047-a0c1-bc76ed7e5cc2.description: This badge demonstrates skills and knowledge of Teradata SQL for Business Users. Earners of this badge understand primary and secondary indexes, can write queries in SQL that access single and multiple tables, can use SQL Assistant to submit queries, and know how to produce totals and subtotals in reports using aggregation operators. They understand the use of various join strategies and subqueries and can create queries which perform ranking of data and extract data samples from large tables.
69c87b01-beda-4047-a0c1-bc76ed7e5cc2.name: Teradata - SQL for Business Users

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Teradata SQL for Business Users on-demand course with a passing score of at least 75%.

65d81154-a557-4f75-abb7-44d807833e93.description: This badge demonstrates skills and knowledge of Teradata Advanced SQL. Earners of this badge understand table constraints and attributes, volatile and global temporary tables, and creating tables from existing tables. They know how to retrieve and manipulate aggregations. Learners who complete this course understand date time, and formatting both data types.
65d81154-a557-4f75-abb7-44d807833e93.name: Teradata - Advanced SQL

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Teradata Advanced SQL on-demand course with a passing score of at least 75%.

dd20f9ee-f4a1-40f6-adb4-f12f190b895e.description: This curriculum includes a collection of courses aimed to provide Learners with an overview of Teradata Vantage, Teradata’s Corporate Strategy, Product Roadmap and Differentiated Capabilities. The training curriculum has been designed for all personas to promote awareness of Teradata Vantage and its competitive differentiation in the Cloud. Learners will earn a Vantage Essential 2022 Digital Badge after completing the required courses & passing the quiz.
dd20f9ee-f4a1-40f6-adb4-f12f190b895e.name: Vantage Training - Essentials Level 2022

badge_template_activities.title: For Teradata employees and external Partners, badge issuance is dependent on completion of select Vantage courses in Teradata University and passing the associated quiz.

f738cad6-7c0b-4b19-b0d0-2df753832c50.description: Successful completion of this introductory curriculum familiarizes Teradata Sales Tech associates with foundational cloud knowledge and competencies.
f738cad6-7c0b-4b19-b0d0-2df753832c50.name: Sales Tech Cloud AMS & APJ Basics

badge_template_activities.title: For Teradata employees, badge issuance is dependent on the completion of the Sales Tech Cloud AMS & APJ Basics curriculum.  The curriculum includes an assessment which has an 80% pass rate requirement.

0df1cc77-480d-4591-92fe-035d4d746dbf.description: Successful completion of this introductory curriculum familiarizes Teradata employee consultants with best-practice consulting skills and a 2022 Essential Level of competency training.
0df1cc77-480d-4591-92fe-035d4d746dbf.name: Consulting Skills - Essentials 2022

badge_template_activities.title: For Teradata consulting employees, badge issuance is dependent on the completion of a percentage of pre-selected courses in Linked-In Learning and Udemy and hosted through the Teradata University learning portal.

47273d5e-426a-4765-8499-ecfcd87128cd.description: A Teradata Certified Advanced Administrator has knowledge/skills to identify optimal archive and database table design, restore strategies, analyze system resource trends, and translate logical to physical data models. They are able to administer Viewpoint, use data to resolve issues, identify benefits of adv. security configs, and use adv space management. Advanced Administrators can also create user definitions for advanced data access requirements, and troubleshoot performance/system issues.
47273d5e-426a-4765-8499-ecfcd87128cd.name: Vantage Certified Advanced Administrator

badge_template_activities.title: Acquire skills from industry experience and training courses
Earn the Teradata Vantage Certified Administrator Certification
Pass a proctored exam, Advanced Administrator Exam, with identity verification at a Pearson VUE Authorized Testing Center

Bypass Option:  Eligible Teradata 14 Certified Database Administrators or Teradata 14 Certified Masters may bypass earning the Teradata Vantage Certified Administrator credential and pass one proctored exam, Advanced Administrator Exam, with identity verification at a Pearson VUE Authorized Testing Center

46be6d16-466d-4945-965b-d40665de43ef.description: A Vantage Certified Adv Developer has knowledge/skills to ID optimal archive/restore strategies, analyze system resource trends, ID optimal DB/ table design, translate logical to physical data model, administer/setup Viewpoint, ID/use collected data to isolate/resolve performance issues, ID the benefits of adv security configs, use the adv space mngement features, create user defins. to meet adv data access requirements, troubleshoot performance/system issues, design/implement workload mngement.
46be6d16-466d-4945-965b-d40665de43ef.name: Vantage Certified Advanced Developer

Bypass Option:  Eligible Teradata 14 Technical Specialists, SOlutions Developers, Enterprise Architects, Database Administrators or Certified Masters may bypass earning the Vantage Certified Developer credential and pass one proctored exam, Advanced Developer Exam, with identity verification at a Pearson VUE Authorized Testing Center

aa769bdb-3a08-4042-a21d-762edbec974b.description: Successful completion of this advanced curriculum familiarizes Teradata Sales Tech associates with advanced cloud knowledge and competencies.
aa769bdb-3a08-4042-a21d-762edbec974b.name: Sales Tech Cloud AMS Advanced

badge_template_activities.title: For Teradata employees, badge issuance is dependent on the completion of the Sales Tech Cloud Advanced curriculum.

8d9e8cf8-8886-4cfb-9e15-fa34248bfd8e.description: A Vantage Certified System Architect has the knowledge and skills necessary to architect solutions with rigor centered around the SQL Engine and its interactions with the surrounding ecosystem. This includes system architecture concepts, information management and data governance, performance design and optimization, data integration, data security, system protection, data residency and portability, information delivery, and workload management.
8d9e8cf8-8886-4cfb-9e15-fa34248bfd8e.name: Vantage Certified System Architect

badge_template_activities.title: Acquire skills from industry experience and training courses
Earn the Vantage Certified Associate Certification
Pass a proctored exam, System Architect Exam, with identity verification at a Pearson VUE Authorized Testing Center

Bypass Option:  Eligible Teradata 14 Certified Individuals may bypass earning the Vantage Certified Associate credential and pass one proctored exam, System Architect Exam, with identity verification at a Pearson VUE Authorized Testing Center

1188aa3a-cf44-44fe-9980-8a8f67a99b8b.description: This cloud curriculum focuses on several relevant essential cloud skills for today's Teradata field consultant. The courses are self-paced as an individual gains foundational level knowledge of cloud services and how they are provided by AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud. This curriculum culminates with the preparation & completion of each respective cloud vendor certification. Cloud training and certifications follow consultants internally & externally as signs of distinction and knowledge.
1188aa3a-cf44-44fe-9980-8a8f67a99b8b.name: Vantage Training - Literate Level 2021 - (internal only)

badge_template_activities.title: For Teradata employees badge issuance is dependent on completion of select Vantage courses in Teradata University.
For Teradata employees badge issuance is dependent on completion of an external cloud vendor certification.

5d918e7a-4479-48c0-a19b-a0a1a2fd9bbb.description: The Transcend Self-Service Basics badge earner has successfully completed the Transcend Self-Service Basics course demonstrating an understanding of Transcend Self-Service and Personal Database. The badge earner has demonstrated knowledge and completed practical exercises utilizing Personal Database, Vantage Editor and EasyLoader Basic.
5d918e7a-4479-48c0-a19b-a0a1a2fd9bbb.name: Transcend Self-Service Basics

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Transcend Self-Service Course by completing practical exercises using Personal Database, Vantage Editor and EasyLoader Basic and passing the Final Exam demonstrating knowledge and practical ability of Transcend Self-Service, Personal Database, Vantage Editor and EasyLoader Basic.

3849639f-607f-4c7e-83f7-4464b82c84c4.description: A Teradata Certification Exam Developer Contributor earner has demonstrated their strong knowledge of Teradata technology and contributed to the Teradata Certification program including but not limited to exam development/exam support. Through their successful demonstration of both technical and soft skills, they have enabled peer SMEs to enhance their knowledge while materially contributing to the enhancement, integrity and value of the Teradata Certification program.
3849639f-607f-4c7e-83f7-4464b82c84c4.name: Teradata Certification Exam Developer Contributor Badge

badge_template_activities.title: Materially contributed to the creation of Teradata Certification job task analyses and/or item development either remotely or at an in-person event.

b16efd33-e2a6-4138-bb92-84e72ef3ff58.description: A Vantage Certified Master has the knowledge and skills to be a technical authority for designing, implementing, performing analytics on, and managing a Teradata enterprise-wide data warehouse. This individual can provide recommendations on all aspects of the data warehouse lifecycle from conceptualization through production implementation and ongoing management and support. Related exams below are based on the Advanced SQL Engine.
b16efd33-e2a6-4138-bb92-84e72ef3ff58.name: Vantage Certified Master

badge_template_activities.title: Acquire skills from industry experience and training courses
Earn the Vantage Master Certification
Pass three proctored exams, Advanced Administrator, Advanced Developer and System Architect Exams, with identity verification at through Pearson VUE

950b13cc-7429-425c-a018-ac4e5ab29b76.description: A Data Challenge Finalist has demonstrated their knowledge of the core concepts of data analysis and visualization leveraging various technologies. They understand database and big data concepts and successfully presented their own work to a global audience of data professionals at the Teradata Universe Conference (virtual presentation in 2020 due to COVID-19). Finally, they delivered results to address various business problems submitted by our non-profit partner.
950b13cc-7429-425c-a018-ac4e5ab29b76.name: Teradata Data Challenge Finalist

badge_template_activities.title: Reviewed provided charity data set and business questions with submission to annual competitions

Selected as a FINALIST in the competition by Teradata selection committee and charity partners due to the proven application of data and analytics skills as well as the successful virtual presentation in 2020 due to COVID-19
Competed in Teradata University Network's Annual Data Challenge and prepare presentation materials for the formal presentations
Presented to audiences virtually in 2020
Awarded Data Challenge Finalist status by Teradata committee and our non-profit partner judges

6d68eec8-7066-42c8-868c-9b13de4c8b1e.description: Analytics Challenge Finalist has demonstrated their knowledge of the core concepts of data analysis and visualization leveraging various technologies. 6d68eec8-7066-42c8-868c-9b13de4c8b1e.name: Teradata Analytics Challenge Finalist

Competed in the Annual Analytics Challenge and prepare presentation materials for the finalist presentation virtual session
Presented to audience VIRTUALLY in 2020
Awarded Challenge Finalist status by Teradata committee

3021c6c4-355e-4ce5-ad79-b1d427acd90f.description: This badge demonstrates general knowledge relating to how to use data ingestion and data profiling, the tools that can be used for both, the most and least common data types for both, complex data types, types of imputations, how feature scaling and encoding work and tools and approaches in the feature selection process.
3021c6c4-355e-4ce5-ad79-b1d427acd90f.name: Teradata Citizen Data Scientist - Data Ingestion, Profiling and Prep

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Introduction to Teradata Vantage Analytic Node Parts 1 and 2 courses and Introduction to Data Science Process - CRISP course and Introduction to Data Ingestion, Profiling and Preparation course

cf635a76-005d-4012-826b-6bee3faa468f.description: This exam establishes that the candidate has the knowledge/skills to design/operationalize data processing systems, manage & optimize data solutions including unstructured data & understand & leverage the tools and features of Vantage to enable interoperability. This includes Manage & Optimize Data Solutions, Transaction Processing & Lock Management, SQL Concepts, Data Integration Strategies, Solution Optimization & Vantage Integration & Interoperability. Covers Vantage 2.2/Adv SQL Eng 17.05.
cf635a76-005d-4012-826b-6bee3faa468f.name: Vantage Data Engineering Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Acquire skills from industry experience and training courses
Earn the Vantage Data Engineering Certification

c8631867-1242-4560-a133-f8ceab018023.description: A Teradata Certification Exam Developer Contributor earner has contributed to the Teradata Certification program in 2022 including but not limited to exam development, training and/or exam support. Through their successful demonstration of both technical and soft skills, they have enabled peer SMEs to enhance their knowledge while materially contributing to the enhancement, integrity and value of the Teradata Certification program.
c8631867-1242-4560-a133-f8ceab018023.name: Teradata Certification Exam Developer Contributor Badge - 2022

badge_template_activities.title: Materially contributed to the creation of Teradata Certification job task analyses, exam development or training either remotely or at an in-person event.

3a72e26f-ed97-4a1c-be23-de904d5e8273.description: A Vantage Analytics Cert establishes that the candidate has the knowledge/skills to use specified Vantage functions, contextualize data, create & communicate compelling & actionable insights from data, & apply analytics/visualization techniques for the investigation of all relevant data. This includes Data Management/Governance, Data Visualization/Presentation, Statistical Techniques, Data Analytics Methods & Algorithms, & Validation & Evaluation. Covers Vantage 1.1/Adv SQL Eng 16.20.
3a72e26f-ed97-4a1c-be23-de904d5e8273.name: Vantage Analytics Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Acquire skills from industry experience and training courses
Earn the Vantage Analytics Certification
Pass a proctored exam, Vantage Analytics Exam, with identity verification through Pearson VUE Testing

d9b34598-a1bb-418f-aed4-e1fafa763b2a.description: This badge demonstrates general knowledge relating to Supervised/Unsupervised Machine Learning concepts, use cases, workflow processes, the learning function at a high level, SQL Syntax, Inputs and Outputs, Predictive and other learning functions, and assessment/interpretability criteria.
d9b34598-a1bb-418f-aed4-e1fafa763b2a.name: Teradata Citizen Data Scientist - Predictive Modeling

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Introduction to Teradata Vantage Analytic Node Parts 1 and 2 courses and Introduction to Data Science Process - CRISP course and Introduction to Predictive Modeling course

dc7e1a53-a9db-4258-8693-b62b4ab44595.description: This badge demonstrates general knowledge relating to AppCenter visualization capabilities and concepts, typical use cases, different activities that can be accomplished with AppCenter, which visualization should be used for which purpose, and other tools that can be used (SpotFire, PowerBI, etc.)
dc7e1a53-a9db-4258-8693-b62b4ab44595.name: Teradata Citizen Data Scientist - Visualization

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Introduction to Teradata Vantage Analytic Node Parts 1 and 2 courses and Introduction to Data Science Process - CRISP course and Teradata App Center Visualizations Overview course

Covers Vantage 2.3/Adv SQL Eng 17.10.

54b98e77-f1ea-419a-9422-797eff5be6b0.description: This badge demonstrates general knowledge relating to nPath function with Teradata Vantage, what nPath function does at a high level, how nPath works, nPath SQL syntax, nPath inputs and outputs and know how it's visualized (for example: AppCenter).
54b98e77-f1ea-419a-9422-797eff5be6b0.name: Teradata Citizen Data Scientist - Path and Pattern

0357f71a-9217-444e-a59f-2ecbe509cdd0.description: This badge demonstrates general knowledge relating to Time Series/Time Series Analysis concepts and use cases, Time Series table creation, data preparation, inserting data into tables, migration of existing tables to Time Series including strategies, time series analysis high level functions, SQL syntax, inputs and outputs and visualization.
0357f71a-9217-444e-a59f-2ecbe509cdd0.name: Teradata Citizen Data Scientist - Time Series

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Introduction to Teradata Vantage Analytic Node Parts 1 and 2 courses and Introduction to Data Science Process - CRISP course and Time Series Analytics, Introduction to Temporal Tables and Implementing Temporal on Teradata courses.

3b608280-0e69-4e15-9610-f934fd06ef87.description: This badge demonstrates general knowledge of Citizen Data Scientist topics including data ingestion, profiling and prep, path and pattern, time series, predictive modeling and visualization. Individual has completed the corresponding curriculum for all 5 areas. This is a badge issued in recognition of that total curriculum coverage.
3b608280-0e69-4e15-9610-f934fd06ef87.name: Teradata Citizen Data Scientist - Specialization

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the core courses and the individual curriculum for all 5 citizen data scientist topic areas. Earned all 5 topic area citizen data scientist badges.

c9982480-5efd-4176-85f0-0f1f9f29f5f8.description: A VantageCloud Lake Certified Associate has knowledge of the core concepts of VantageCloud Lake. The Associate understands general concepts, data architectures, VantageCloud Lake architecture and components, data distribution and access, security and privacy as well as a basic understanding of Teradata Tools and Utilities. The Associate understands at a conceptual level how Teradata provides value (use cases).
c9982480-5efd-4176-85f0-0f1f9f29f5f8.name: VantageCloud Lake Associate

badge_template_activities.title: Acquire knowledge from training course
Pass a proctored exam, VantageCloud Lake Associate exam, with identity verification at a Pearson VUE Authorized Testing Center or via online proctoring

f5b5b310-35ff-4550-bd90-dc746852e8a0.description: A Vantage Data Science Cert establishes that the candidate has the knowledge/skills needed to use specified Vantage functions, contextualize data, create/communicate insights from data, apply analytics/visualization techniques, apply/interpret machine learning, choose function parameters for each situation, apply statistical concepts/methodologies, & select machine learning methods/algorithms interpreting the model's performance/accuracy for decision-making. Covers Vantage 1.1/Adv SQL Eng 16.20.
f5b5b310-35ff-4550-bd90-dc746852e8a0.name: Vantage Data Science Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Acquire skills from industry experience and training courses
Earn the Vantage Data Science Certification
Pass a proctored exam, Vantage Data Science Exam, with identity verification through Pearson VUE Testing

f64e4ebf-fe71-472c-8302-4e49bf3bc9b1.description: This exam establishes that the candidate has the knowledge and skills relating to Monitoring Vantage, Performance Management, Security Management and Auditing, User Administration, Database Management and Workload Management and Integration necessary to monitor Vantage. Covers Vantage 2.2/Adv SQL Eng 17.05.
f64e4ebf-fe71-472c-8302-4e49bf3bc9b1.name: Vantage Administration Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Acquire skills from industry experience and training courses
Earn the Vantage Administration Certification
Pass a proctored exam, Vantage Administration Exam, with identity verification through Pearson VUE Testing

bf50788f-a600-49d5-9f3f-9f377c79711e.description: A Data Challenge Honorable Mention has demonstrated their knowledge of the core concepts of data analysis and visualization leveraging various technologies. They understand database and big data concepts and successfully submitted significant work in the annual competition.
bf50788f-a600-49d5-9f3f-9f377c79711e.name: Teradata Data Challenge Honorable Mention

badge_template_activities.title: Reviewed datasets and business questions provided by a Teradata non-profit partner with submission to annual competitions
Analyzed data and developed data visualizations in a project team
Awarded Data Challenge Honorable Mention status by Teradata committee

95d01f74-1a5d-426a-8e4b-c1da02ec1e7f.description: The Teradata University Network Advisory Board is a blend of academic experts and business leaders who direct and guide the Teradata University and Student Networks. Their insight is critical to the development and enhancement of this unique teaching resource.
95d01f74-1a5d-426a-8e4b-c1da02ec1e7f.name: TUN Board Member

badge_template_activities.title: Individuals serving on the Teradata University Network provide strategic input and guidance on types of information and resources that should be made available on the Teradata University Network website.

Leveraging their knowledge and application experience in teaching analytics and data, board members develop content for registered faculty and students to leverage on the TUN website and through TUN programs.

1a450dbd-fce1-4c30-9491-c2cce1578ce2.description: Teradata University Network Faculty Sponsors coach and mentor their students who submit their work to Teradata’s annual student competitions, the Analytics Challenge and the Data Challenge. Sponsors support students as they utilize various tools to analyze datasets and advise them if selected as finalists, to successfully present their own work to a global audience of data professionals at the Teradata Universe Conference.
1a450dbd-fce1-4c30-9491-c2cce1578ce2.name: TUN Faculty Sponsor

badge_template_activities.title: Reviewed analytics of self-selected data set and business questions to be submitted to annual competitions
Prepared students in all aspects of submissions, from utilization of tools to visualization, to presentation skills.

5bacd4cd-1e01-469a-a2f0-e27672408835.description: This badge demonstrates skills and knowledge needed to sell to customers with a Cloud First Strategy, including understanding customer ecosystems, elements of a cloud operating model, the difficulties of transitioning to a cloud operating model, and impacts of cloud economics. Earners of this badge have also completed training designed to explore Teradata's place in the market landscape, how to leverage CSP partners, and cloud service descriptions for either commercial or technical roles.
5bacd4cd-1e01-469a-a2f0-e27672408835.name: Cloud Foundations - Journeys and Strategies Expert

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Cloud Foundations Curriculum and pass the Cloud Foundations Badging exam with at least a 90%.

09973c52-b01f-4e13-85ef-6de94ed80a12.description: Teradata University Network awards scholarships to the Teradata Universe Conference to select faculty and students based on their accomplishments and proven interest in Teradata technology.
09973c52-b01f-4e13-85ef-6de94ed80a12.name: Teradata Universe TUN Scholarship Winner

badge_template_activities.title: Faculty and students are awarded TUN scholarship to attend the Teradata Universe Conference based on their academic accomplishments and pursuit of Teradata knowledge. Recognition of attendance at the Teradata Analytics Universe Conference including attendance at expert sessions, keynotes and networking events.

50763b86-8946-4a8e-8def-6731cd2af7c0.description: A Vantage Certified Master 2 has the proven knowledge and skills necessary to be a technical authority for designing, implementing, performing analytics on, and managing a Teradata data and analytics platform. This individual can provide recommendations on all aspects of the data warehouse lifecycle from conceptualization through production implementation and ongoing management and support.
50763b86-8946-4a8e-8def-6731cd2af7c0.name: Vantage Master 2 Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Acquire skills from industry experience and training courses
Earn the Vantage Master 2 Certification
Pass three proctored exams, Vantage Administration, Data Engineering, and Architecture exams, with identity verification through Pearson VUE

skills.name: Designing And Implementing A Data Warehouse
Perform Analtyics On A Data Warehouse

5d30f7bb-c271-43a5-89b0-24faff57c7c3.description: A Teradata Certification Exam Developer Contributor earner has contributed to the Teradata Certification program in 2023 including but not limited to exam development, training and/or exam support. Through their successful demonstration of both technical and soft skills, they have enabled peer SMEs to enhance their knowledge while materially contributing to the enhancement, integrity and value of the Teradata Certification program.
5d30f7bb-c271-43a5-89b0-24faff57c7c3.name: Teradata Certification Exam Developer Contributor Badge - 2023

badge_template_activities.title: Materially contributed to the creation of Teradata Certification job task analyses, exam development or training either remotely or at an in-person event.

61ef0f33-22a7-4693-a43b-54321ad8ffc8.description: This cloud curriculum focuses on several relevant essential cloud skills for today’s Teradata field consultant. The courses are self-paced as an individual gains intermediate level knowledge of cloud services and how they are provided by AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud. Cloud training and certifications follows consultants internally and externally as signs of distinction and knowledge.
61ef0f33-22a7-4693-a43b-54321ad8ffc8.name: Vantage Training - Savvy Level 2021 (intenal only)

badge_template_activities.title: For Teradata employees, badge issuance is dependent on completion of select Vantage courses in Teradata University.

b0a1bb54-b3a4-4caa-94da-c6066d535ca1.description: Earners of the Accredited EBC Discussion Leader badge have completed foundational EBC training and observed customer and partner briefings in order to learn from successful executive engagements. Prerequisites include having a strong knowledge of Teradata offerings and proven skills in Technical, Consulting, Industry and Architecture.
b0a1bb54-b3a4-4caa-94da-c6066d535ca1.name: Accredited Discussion Leader - EBC

badge_template_activities.title: Attend one-hour EBC Orientation
Complete two-day Essential Speaker Training
Complete the two-day Executive Engagement immersion workshop.
Observe 12 hours of customer and/or partner briefings hosted by the Teradata Executive Briefing Center.

2a746a12-5961-4263-9074-079032097701.description: A Vantage Certified Data Science Master has the knowledge & skills to use specified Vantage functions, contextualize data, create/communicate insights from data, apply analytics or visualization techniques to investigate relevant date, choose function parameters, select ML methods & algorithms to derive insights, design/operationalize data processing systems, manage/optimize data solutions & leverage the tools/features of Vantage for interoperability. Related exams below are based on Vantage.
2a746a12-5961-4263-9074-079032097701.name: Vantage Data Science Master Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Acquire skills from industry experience and training courses
Earn the Vantage Data Science Master Certification
Pass three proctored exams, Vantage Analytics, Data Engineering, and Data Science exams, with identity verification at through Pearson VUE

skills.name: Designing And Implementing A Data Warehouse
Perform Analtyics On A Data Warehouse

12e92d58-0c7a-4eb8-ae24-575f95d0d0c5.description: The Teradata Technology Award Winner has demonstrated their knowledge and successful use of core Teradata technologies in their submission to Teradata annual student competitions. They understand the power and benefits of the Teradata database and Teradata Analytics Platform components and tools. Students successfully presented their own work to a global audience of data professionals virtually
12e92d58-0c7a-4eb8-ae24-575f95d0d0c5.name: Teradata Technology Award Winner

badge_template_activities.title: Analyzed data and developed data visualizations leveraging Teradata technology in a project team

Reviewed analytics of either charity data set and business questions or self-selected data. Submit to annual competitions. Selected as a finalist due to application of data visualization and analytics skills.
Competeed in Teradata's Annual Analytics Challenge and prepare presentation materials for both formal presentations
Presented to Teradata virtual attendees
Awarded Teradata Technology Winner status by Teradata committee

7061d8d7-3c64-4fed-97ef-d02bbdcde904.description: Earners of the Accredited Architect badges have deep experience in applying the Teradata Architecture Framework BIAS, in architecting data analytic solutions performing business outcome analysis, and information, application, and systems architecture. They have a strong knowledge of TOGAF, Teradata Vantage, and its ecosystem. They have proven skills in Technical, Consulting, and Architecture domains, with experience in customer engagements (Teradata/non-Teradata) and internal initiatives.
7061d8d7-3c64-4fed-97ef-d02bbdcde904.name: Accredited Architect

badge_template_activities.title: Deep knowledge and experience of Teradata Architecture Framework - BIAS, TOGAF knowledge, TOGAF 9.2 certification a plus but not mandatory, Knowledge of Architecture Design Patterns, Expert Consulting skills, Understanding the Why–What–How of Teradata Vantage and its ecosystem, Foundation skills based on the three Architecture curricula for Technology, Consulting, Architecture as mentioned in the URL.
Completed at least 2 assignments within the past 3 years in the role of an Architect. Created architecture assets. Provide documentation for work done in all engagements.

0e5ea8cc-4dec-41e4-88db-5e4e440e7b89.description: This badge demonstrates skills and knowledge of Teradata SQL for Business Users. Earners of this badge understand primary and secondary indexes, can write queries in SQL that access single and multiple tables, can use Teradata Studio to submit queries, and know how to produce totals and subtotals in reports using aggregation operators. They understand the use of various join strategies and subqueries and can create queries which perform ranking of data and extract data samples from large tables.
0e5ea8cc-4dec-41e4-88db-5e4e440e7b89.name: Teradata - SQL for Developers

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Teradata SQL for Developers on-demand course with a passing score of at least 75%.

ef8e5217-b9e2-49fa-8ac7-2be853799b1b.description: Teradata University Network(TUN) Campus Ambassadors are individuals who promote Teradata, Teradata technology, and Teradata University Network to students and faculty at campuses and academic conferences around the globe.
ef8e5217-b9e2-49fa-8ac7-2be853799b1b.name: TUN Campus Ambassador

badge_template_activities.title: Spreading the news about Teradata and Teradata University Network on both college campuses presenting to classes, student clubs and organizations and at academic conferences.
Connecting with faculty and students on campuses and sharing updates on available resources builds community and educational networks.

33655fff-7d22-4cb1-9027-afd669b51b85.description: Authorized Trainers are Teradata employees that after being assessed by an Expert, are qualified to deliver Vantage MasterClass in an Authorized Teradata Training Center.
33655fff-7d22-4cb1-9027-afd669b51b85.name: Authorized Trainer - Vantage MasterClass

badge_template_activities.title: Attend and successfully complete the Vantage MasterClass training course as well as a requisite facilitation course if no prior training experience.
Co-teach at least half the class with an Expert trainer and obtain confirmation of qualifications.
Possess a Teradata Vantage, Vantage 2 or VantageCloud Lake certification.

fa8028b0-76a6-4d45-8167-98386114b89a.description: This curriculum includes a collection of courses aimed to provide learners (customers, partners, employees, academics) with an overview of Clearscape.
fa8028b0-76a6-4d45-8167-98386114b89a.name: Clearscape - Level 1

badge_template_activities.title: Badge issuance is dependent on completion of select Clearscape courses in Teradata University and passing the associated quizzes.

d4bd486e-df68-4217-a9db-a2701416cea6.description: Qualified Trainers are individuals employed outside of Teradata that after being assessed by an Expert, are qualified to deliver Vantage MasterClass in an Authorized Teradata Training Center.
d4bd486e-df68-4217-a9db-a2701416cea6.name: Qualified Trainer - Vantage MasterClass

badge_template_activities.title: Attend and successfully complete the Vantage MasterClass training course as well as a requisite facilitation course if no prior training experience.
Co-teach at least half the class with an Expert trainer and obtain confirmation of qualifications.
Possess a Teradata Vantage, Vantage 2 or VantageCloud Lake certification.

2e33fd9b-497f-40cd-a25d-2b515afab63f.description: Earners of the Accredited Mentor Badge are Teradata employees that have demonstrated practical and course experience focused on mentoring initiatives within Teradata.
2e33fd9b-497f-40cd-a25d-2b515afab63f.name: Teradata Accredited Mentor Badge

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of Being a Good Mentor Teradata course.
Completion of Becoming an Inspiring Mentor Teradata course.
Agree to Teradata pledge - As a Teradata Mentor, I confirm, that I have listened, supported, and encouraged a Mentee and that I have successfully completed a Teradata Mentoring Program initiative

c70c9938-caf5-4766-af65-84c0c1bfba4a.description: This badge demonstrates general knowledge of Teradata VantageCloud Lake. Earners of this badge can describe Teradata Vantage and its key components, differentiate between the components that are available with the initial release versus those that are part of the future vision, articulate the business challenges it addresses and the business value it providesand find additional resources
c70c9938-caf5-4766-af65-84c0c1bfba4a.name: Teradata - Intro to VantageCloud Lake

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Teradata VantageCloud Lake web-based course 95564 with a passing score of at least 80%.

36599636-1e32-49b7-898e-5562192e3de8.description: Earners of the Teradata Partner Champion Badge have completed the foundational MasterClass curriculum or have successfully earned a current Teradata Vantage certification. They have demonstrated strong Teradata knowledge and/or proven skills required to support colleagues within their organization as they increase their foundational knowledge of Teradata and build their skills through certification.
36599636-1e32-49b7-898e-5562192e3de8.name: Teradata Partner Champion Badge

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the Teradata Master Class OR earning a Teradata Certification.

Agree to lead, support and provide guidance to help other employees within their organization to achieve their Teradata learning goals which may include core training, badging or certification attainment that will benefit Teradata, their organization, and mutual customers.

df7eec7d-2024-4c4c-92aa-440e76e78b0b.description: Faculty, Students and Partners/Professionals are all invited to submit content for Teradata University Network (TUN). If approved by editors, they are recognized as TUN Contributors.
df7eec7d-2024-4c4c-92aa-440e76e78b0b.name: TUN Website Contributor

badge_template_activities.title: Contributor to the Teradata University Network(TUN) providing assets and resources leveraging application of knowledge to help other faculty and students registered for TUN access.

a304a23b-4a8c-43c8-a8d5-9b0cce6a0823.description: This badge demonstrates skills and knowledge needed to sell VantageCloud Enterprise. This includes articulating potential customer pain points and demonstrating Teradata solutions therein, explaining Teradata unit pricing and packaging for enterprise, and positioning VantageCloud Enterprise in existing customer strategy and architecture. Earners of this badge have also demonstrated their ability to discover customer's needs and deliver on their customer's vision.
a304a23b-4a8c-43c8-a8d5-9b0cce6a0823.name: VantageCloud Enterprise - Solutions Sales Expert

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Selling VantageCloud Enterprise Curriculum and pass the manager-assessed pitch exercise (per manager discretion).

f061477b-5c1c-4c48-a513-d09173a7ff4d.description: This curriculum includes a collection of courses aimed to provide learners with an overview of Teradata Vantage and Corporate Strategy, Product Roadmap, Teradata VantageCloud Lake and Clearscape as well as our differentiated capabilities. The training curriculum was designed for all personas to promote awareness of Teradata Vantage & its competitive differentiation in the Cloud. Learners will earn a Vantage Essential 2023 Digital Badge after completing the required courses & passing the quiz.
f061477b-5c1c-4c48-a513-d09173a7ff4d.name: Vantage Training - Essentials Level 2023

badge_template_activities.title: For Teradata employees and external Partners, badge issuance is dependent on completion of select Vantage courses in Teradata University and passing the associated quiz.
